post:
VPSVille is launching its spring VPS sale! Now offering a 25% lifetime discount on new sign-ups until June 1st!
Don't miss this incredible opportunity to locate in Canada's largest datacenter great prices!

Purchase any VPS plan (Value plans or Host-in-a-box) with the coupon code HD455 and recieve a lifetime 25% discount!. Offer expires June 1st.

Get your new VPS on our enterprise grade hardware. Quad-core Xeons with 3Ware RAID, dual power supplies,
dual NIC's and dual switching, our servers do not fail. We do not host your valuable data on consumer grade equipment!

All of our VPS's enjoy the following features:

  • Fast connection and low latency to your customers over a premium Peer1 network link.
  • Located at 151 Front St. West in Toronto.
  • 100% Uptime! We compensate you if we experience downtime.
  • Satisfaction guaranteed, or your money back.
  • Enterprise grade servers with SuperMicro motherboards, Seagate disks, ECC memory and 3Ware RAID controllers.
  • 100mbit internet uplink.
  • We do not oversell disk, cpu or memory resources.

Terms:

  • These discounts apply to the packages listed in this posting.
  • Available for NEW order only. (For new and existing customers.)
  • Coupon code must be supplied at time of order.
  • Offer expires on June 1st.
  • Prices include applicable taxes.

All plans come loaded with:

+ 4 Xeon CPU's
+ 100mb port
+ Full root access
+ Choice of OS
+ Instant free setup

Value Plans

+ $7.50/month after coupon!
+ Use Coupon Code HD455 for a lifetime 25% discount!

+ Preinstalled with CentOS, DNS, Apache, MySQL, PHP, email + anti-virus + anti-spam.

[Details]

VPSVille Gives You:

  • Real Canadian VPS hosting at a low price!
  • Guaranteed uptime - we put our money where our mouth is!
  • Money back satisfaction guarantee!
  • No setup fee's!
  • Instant fully automated setup!
  • Custom control panel to control your server.
